T02D2247:137a-1: do ha ti n'a ma ta ttva au pa de sha /
T02D2247:137a-3: do ha ti zhes bya ba de kho na nyid
T02D2247:137a-4: kyi man ngag / dpal he ru ka la phyag
T02D2247:137a-5: 'tshal lo // theg pa gsum ni gnas pa zhes bshad de //
T02D2247:137a-6: bye brag smra ba gnyis su shes par bya //
T02D2247:137a-7: nyan thos dman dang 'bring bo nub phyogs pa //
T02D2247:137a-8: mchog dang rang rgyal dag ni kha che ba'o //
T02D2247:137a-9: phung po lnga ni kun gyi grub mtha' yin //
T02D2247:137a-10: gang zag brjod med nub phyogs pa gnyis 'dod //
T02D2247:137a-11: thams cad ji srid 'tsho bar gsum skyabs 'gro //
T02D2247:137a-12: bdag nyid dul ba'i snying rje lhag par 'byung //
T02D2247:137a-13: theg pa dman pa mi gtsang bam pa de //
T02D2247:137a-14: lus gtsang blo de dri mar shes par bya //
T02D2247:137a-15: 'byung dang 'jug pa 'bring po'i sgom pa ste //
T02D2247:137a-16: de yi dri ma bum par mnyam sbyor yin //
T02D2247:137a-17: rab kyi sgom pa bden pa bzhi po ste //
T02D2247:137a-18: yan lag rgyas lam gang zag stong pa nyid //
T02D2247:137a-19: sdug bsngal 'khor ba kun 'byung chags pa ste //
T02D2247:137a-20: 'gog pa mya ngan 'das pa zag med lam //
T02D2247:137a-21: rtag pa bzhi pa la dmigs dri ma med //
T02D2247:137a-22: rang gi bsam mi khyab sgom rang sangs rgyas //
T02D2247:137a-23: mnyam gzhag 'di ni dri ma gnyis shes te //
T02D2247:137a-24: myos dang sems med pa ru shes par bya //
T02D2247:137a-25: phra ba 'dus pa mdo sde pa yi lugs //
T02D2247:137a-26: bsam mi khyab sgom dri ma sngon dang 'dra //
T02D2247:137a-27: 'di yi lta ba pha rol phyin drug nyid //
T02D2247:137b-0: snying @137b rje'i stobs kyis yongs su bsngo ba'o //
T02D2247:137b-1: 'gro ba sems tsam yin te rdul phran med //
T02D2247:137b-2: rnal 'byor spyod pa rmi lam lta bu ste //
T02D2247:137b-3: sngon po ser po la sogs sna tshogs snang //
T02D2247:137b-4: gang zhig 'dod pa thams cad rang bzhin te //
T02D2247:137b-5: thams cad rang gis rig pa'i bsam gtan no //
T02D2247:137b-6: rtag par lta ba sgom pa'i dri mar shes //
T02D2247:137b-7: gzhan yang srid pa'i bag chags 'dod pa'o //
T02D2247:137b-8: rnam pa thams cad mi mthun phyogs su gnas //
T02D2247:137b-9: gnyis su med mnyam bsam yas rnam par dag / snying rje'i rang bzhin rnam med rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02D2247:137b-10: gzugs kyi sa gnyis rtsa ba las 'phros te /
T02D2247:137b-11: bsam gtan lta ba'i dri ma sngon rang bzhin //
T02D2247:137b-12: mtha' bzhi spangs nas rang gi rig pa tsam //
T02D2247:137b-13: chu zla sgyu ma rmi lam lta bu nyid //
T02D2247:137b-14: lta ba 'di yi bsam gtan de gsungs pa'o //
T02D2247:137b-15: rang rig spangs pa'i chad pa dri ma yin //
T02D2247:137b-16: 'gro ba gzhan nas gzhan du gzhan thob 'gyur //
T02D2247:137b-17: rnam pa thams cad rang bzhin dag pa ste //
T02D2247:137b-18: 'di ni dpe med rab tu mi gnas pa'o //
T02D2247:137b-19: bsam gtan lta ba'i dri ma mtha' dag rig / rnam pa de phyir pha rol phyin theg pa'o //
T02D2247:137b-20: bde ba'i rang bzhin nyams myong gsang sngags che //
T02D2247:137b-21: rdo rje dang ni mtsho skyes sbyor ba'i sems //
T02D2247:137b-22: mchog tu chags pa'i nyi zla yang dag sbyor //
T02D2247:137b-23: snying rje'i thabs kyi stobs kyis 'gro ba kun //
T02D2247:137b-24: gdod ma'i bde ba der ni de bzhin nyid //
T02D2247:137b-25: gang du ro mnyam byang chub sems rang bzhin //
T02D2247:137b-26: de ni lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba'o //
T02D2247:137b-27: de tshe gnyis ni sngon du der lhung ba //
T02D2247:137b-28: gzhan yang stong dang snying rje der mnyam gyur //
T02D2247:137b-29: 'gro kun lhan cig skyes pa'i rnam pa ru //
T02D2247:137b-30: bla ma mchog gis bka' stsal ji ltar rtogs /
T02D2247:137b-31: do ha ti zhes bya ba de kho na nyid kyi man ngag rdzogs so /
T02D2247:137b-33: // / aa ba dh'u t'i pas mdzad pa //
